https://t.co/visYrwrSGc @MikeyPiff And boy do we know it. Thank you @SIRIUSXM and thank you @MikeyPiff ❤️❤️❤️❤️🎧 It set our record label into chaos mode. Seemingly 17 year old Michael and 19 year old Ashton had written the song we’d been looking for. We made the video for it with frank borin. And the rest was history. So we rolled with the concept. I came up with the drum part. That spired from a rudiment I practiced. Michael and I recorded the demo pretty fast with Jake. And went home without thinking twice about the song. We thought it was terrible at the time Jake instantly plays us the chorus he’d already written on a nylon acoustic guitar. He sings “she looks so perfect standing their in my American apparel underwear” Michael and I think. Wow that’s fucking stupid. But at the time our A&R were big on “lyric twists / gimmicks” Michael and I walk into the studio in Venice CA. Which happens to be butch walkers studio. By the bathroom is a plaque for 15 million record sales of PINK’s success. Massive. 10 am. I’m living in LA and Liz and security guard Dave are driving our mini van we rented to get around to sessions that Capitol records were booking for us. we were so excited to work with Jake Sinclair, he’d worked on weezer, and panic at the disco. Happy 7th birthday to our first ever hit song SHE LOOKS SO PERFECT. Here’s the thread 🧵 of the creation and writing process. Thank you to the fans that have been with us since this breakout jam. We love you. #7YearsOfSLSP https://t.co/X1SlxXfVmI @_Hate_But_Love_ @Ashton5SOS @Luke5SOS @Michael5SOS @Calum5SOS @Tha5SOSFamily Incredible. The joy this brings us is incomprehensible. @MikeyPiff And boy do we know it. Thank you @SIRIUSXM and thank you @MikeyPiff ❤️❤️❤️❤️🎧

It set our record label into chaos mode. Seemingly 17 year old Michael and 19 year old Ashton had written the song we’d been looking for. We made the video for it with frank borin. And the rest was history.

So we rolled with the concept. I came up with the drum part. That spired from a rudiment I practiced. Michael and I recorded the demo pretty fast with Jake. And went home without thinking twice about the song. We thought it was terrible at the time

Jake instantly plays us the chorus he’d already written on a nylon acoustic guitar. He sings “she looks so perfect standing their in my American apparel underwear” Michael and I think. Wow that’s fucking stupid. But at the time our A&R were big on “lyric twists / gimmicks”
Michael and I walk into the studio in Venice CA. Which happens to be butch walkers studio. By the bathroom is a plaque for 15 million record sales of PINK’s success. Massive.

10 am. I’m living in LA and Liz and security guard Dave are driving our mini van we rented to get around to sessions that Capitol records were booking for us. we were so excited to work with Jake Sinclair, he’d worked on weezer, and panic at the disco.

We stand with all victims of SA. Just because it wasn't us doesn't mean it didn't happen. We will be working even harder to ensure fans are safe at our shows. Our connection with our fans is more important to us than anything in this world.

We are posting this against the advice of our team.

We are done being silent.
